overview: Ken Wayne Shamrock ran away from a nightmare childhood to the neon lights of Japanâ€™s pro-wrestling and Pancrase circuit. There, he learned the showmanship, striking and leglocks which would eventually make him one of the original superstars of an emerging sport, mixed martial arts. Featuring exclusive interviews and rare footage, this FIGHT PASS Original is the definitive retrospective of the iconic UFC Hall of Famer.
title: Pioneers of MMA: Ken Shamrock
